title: Great 1 bed / 1 bath! We Love Pets! Ask about our Pet Policy
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', 'Leasing Office:', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what East Perimeter Pointe Apartments has to offer!', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also have easy access to nearby Atlanta Transit for your commuting needs.", "There's simply no reason not to make these singular Decatur, GA Apartments your new home.", 'Rental Information:', '1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom / 619 - 636 sq ft / $1124/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '− Air Conditioning', '− Breakfast Bar', '− Cozy Fireplaces', '− Custom Paint Tone', '− Dining Room', '− Dishwasher', '− Garbage Disposal', '− Island Kitchens', '− Smoke Free', '− Storage Units', '− Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '− Hardwood Flooring', '− Newly Renovated Apartments', '− Patio or Balcony Options', '− Roommate Floor Plans', '− Townhomes Available', '− Upgraded Lighting Package', 'Additional Information:', '− Business Center', '− Community Events', '− Fax/Copy Services', '− Gated Access', '− Green Community', '− Outdoor Area', '− Pet Friendly', '− Picnic Area', '− Public Transportation', '− Tennis Court(s)', '− Electronic Rent Payment', '− Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '− Monthly Resident Events', '− On-site Maintenance Management', '− Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '− Public Transportation', '− Racquetball Court(s)', '− Resident Referral Bonuses', '− Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DE2F7F100D004448']
